variables.name: AuthorizationBearerToken
variables.description: Bearer JWT used to authorize the availability search request. Expires and must be dynamically obtained.

variables.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key
variables.description: Public subscription key sent with Spirit APIs. Typically static for the web app; can often be hardcoded.

variables.name: originStationCode
variables.description: Origin IATA station code for one-way search.

variables.name: destinationStationCode
variables.description: Destination IATA station code for one-way search.

variables.name: beginDate
variables.description: Departure date (start of search window).

variables.name: endDate
variables.description: Departure date (end of search window). Same as beginDate for one-way single-day search.

variables.name: searchDestinationMacs
variables.description: Flag in stations block; false in observed request.

variables.name: filters.filter
variables.description: Top-level criteria filter mode.

variables.name: passengerType
variables.description: Passenger type code (Adult).

variables.name: passengerCount_ADT
variables.description: Number of adult passengers.

variables.name: currency
variables.description: Pricing currency for the search results.

variables.name: fareFilters.loyalty
variables.description: Fare loyalty filter used for pricing results.

variables.name: fareFilters.classControl
variables.description: Class control setting for fare filtering.

variables.name: taxesAndFees
variables.description: Specifies how taxes and fees are handled in pricing.

variables.name: infantCount
variables.description: Number of infants in the search.

variables.name: birthDates
variables.description: Birthdates array for age-based pricing; empty in observed request.

variables.name: includeBundleAvailability
variables.description: Whether to include bundle availability in the search results.

variables.name: includeWifiAvailability
variables.description: Whether to include Wi-Fi availability in the search results.

variables.name: originalJourneyKeys
variables.description: Original journey keys (empty for new search).

variables.name: originalBookingRecordLocator
variables.description: Original booking record locator (null for new search).

explanation: Variables were extracted from the request headers and JSON body of the identified v3/search POST. Dynamic items like Authorization token, stations, dates, passenger counts, and currency are marked requires_resolution=True. Static flags and configuration-like values (e.g., subscription key, filter modes, includeBundleAvailability) are marked requires_resolution=False. values_to_scan_for include actual values or distinctive substrings to locate the sources of these variables in storage or other transactions.
